message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.NA, cs.SY, cs.GR 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CG (Computational Geometry) is the most likely category as the paper deals with finding the nearest and farthest points on a curve, which is a common problem in computational geometry. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper proposes algorithms for solving the problem. 
- cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) is relevant as the paper discusses the estimation of the answer up to an additive error using a known bound on the speed of the curve. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is a possibility as the paper mentions a Lipschitz condition, which is a common concept in control theory. 
- cs.GR (Graphics) is a possibility as the paper deals with manipulating parametric curves, which is relevant to computer graphics.
